result.markdown: --- title: Robot Intelligence description: | What is Robot Intelligence? date: 2024-10-10 author: - name: Sergio Jácobo-zavaleta image: s20_intelligence.png image-alt: | An image of various robots with some kind of intelligence features like arms and humanoid faces --- ::: {.cell} ::: ` slides`{=html} ` materials`{=html} ## Overview The following topics were covered: - What does Intelligence mean for a robot? - A draft meaning - Should a robot be intelligent? - Should a robot be autonomous? - Commercial Robots ## Event details **Event:** Course: Intelligent and Autonomous Robots | Master in Robotics and Automation **Date:** 10th October, 2024 **Time:** 19:00 **Location:** Universidad Carlos III de Madrid ## Slides Keyboard shortcuts for slideshow (once you've clicked inside it): - Use ← and → to navigate through the slides - Use o for an overview of all slides - Use ? for an overview more keyboard shortcuts - Click the hamburger menu in the bottom left corner of the slide deck for more options - f to toggle full screen doesn't work from this page. Go to [slides](https://ellakaye.github.io/2024-07-31-diverse/) and use that shortcut from there instead
